question: who played cruella de vil in 101 dalmatians
vanilla_rag_result: The passages all relate to the character Cruella de Vil in "101 Dalmatians," but they do not provide specific names. However, in the original animated film released in 1961, Cruella de Vil was voiced by Betty Lou Gerson. In the live-action adaptation released in 1996, the character was portrayed by Glenn Close. If you are referring to the more recent film "Cruella" (2021), the character was played by Emma Stone.
